review_title: Excruciating as a visible minority given widespread white supremacy!
pros: It was unionized, paid well, and had good insurance benefits as well as a pension plan, plus opportunities for professional development.
cons: As a person of colour, I dealt with microaggressions daily, and the organization lacks a basic understanding of anti-oppressive practice approaches.
